security-warning.varnostna-opozorila: V primeru draženja prenehajte z uporabo. Shranjujte nedosegljivo otrokom.

product-info.opis: Intimno milo Lactacyd. Nežna intimna nega za vsakodnevno higieno.

instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Samo za zunanjo uporabo. Po uporabi temeljito sperite z vodo.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Voda, magnesium laureth sulfate, cocamidopropyl betaine, disodium laureth sulfosuccinate, PEG-7 glycerin Cocoate, Phenoxyenthanol, Propylene glycol, PEG-55 Propylene glycol Oleate, Parfum, Lactose, Lactis Proteinum, Cocamide MEA, Laureth-10, Lactic acid, glyceril laurate, glycol distearate, sodium laureth sulfate, 5-bromo-5-nitro-1. 3-dioxane, sodium chloride, methylisothiazolinole, methylchloroisothiazolinone.
